transparent:true,opacity:0.8})// side
];// Group for text

var text="Hi! I'm Saaketh";var size=40;var depth=8;var hover=0;var curveSegments=4;var bevelThickness=1;var bevelSize=0.5;var bevelEnabled=true;// Load font and create text
var loader=new FontLoader();loader.load('/fonts/optimer_bold.typeface.json',function(font){var textGeo=new TextGeometry(text,{font:font,size:size,depth:depth,curveSegments:curveSegments,bevelThickness:bevelThickness,bevelSize:bevelSize,bevelEnabled:bevelEnabled});textGeo.computeBoundingBox();var centerOffset=-0.5*(textGeo.boundingBox.max.x-textGeo.boundingBox.min.x);var textMesh=new THREE.Mesh(textGeo,materials);textMesh.position.x=centerOffset;textMesh.position.y=hover;textMesh.position.z=0;group.add(textMesh);textMeshRef.current=textMesh;});// Add to DOM
